Actions.Name: Eye Beams
Actions.AreaEffect: All foes are shoved 1 and take 2 damage.

Actions.Name: Blade Sweep
Actions.Description: All adjacent foes are shoved 1 and slashed. Slashed foes also take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Soul Nexus
Actions.Description: The [name] hardens and release an aura of swirling souls, gaining aura 2 until the start of its next turn. It becomes immobile and unstoppable. The [name] and allies in the aura become sturdy and gain resistance to damage from abilities used from outside the aura.
